com.tailf.jnc
Class PathCreate

java.lang.Object
  com.tailf.jnc.Path
      com.tailf.jnc.PathCreate

public class PathCreate
extends Path

A "path create" expression.

The result of evaluating a "path create" expression is a new Element node tree. A configuration tree can easily be created with this class.

Example: 

 PathCreate path = new PathCreate("/hosts/host[name='john', age=42]");
 Element element_tree = path.eval(PrefixMap);
